traits.description: Timmy enjoys the feeling of freedom that comes from being nude. this pawn can handle clothing, but will be happier without it.
traits.name: nudist

traits.description: Timmy gets a rush from hurting people, and never minds the sight of blood or death. this pawn is four times as likely to start a social fight as others.
traits.name: bloodlust

traits.description: Timmy is an exceptionally agreeable and giving person. this pawn never insults others and will sometimes offer kind words to brighten the moods of those around them. this pawn also never judges people by their appearance. their agreeableness also makes them more likely to conform to prevailing opinions.
traits.name: kind

traits.description: Timmy has no empathy. The suffering of others doesn't bother them at all. this pawn doesn't mind if others are butchered, left unburied, imprisoned, or sold to slavery - unless it affects them. this pawn also feels no mood boost from socializing.
traits.name: psychopath

traits.description: Timmy was taught that eating human meat is wrong and horrible. But one time, long ago, this pawn tried it... and this pawn liked it.
traits.name: cannibal

traits.description: Timmy always says exactly what's on their mind, especially if it's bugging them. That tends to rub people the wrong way.
traits.name: abrasive

traits.description: Timmy is too smart for their own good. this pawn learns everything much faster than everyone, but can be quite eccentric.
traits.name: toosmart

traits.description: Timmy likes to fight up close and personal. their accuracy is greatly increased in melee combat, but this pawn'll be very unhappy if asked to carry a ranged weapon.
traits.name: brawler

traits.description: For Timmy, there's something exciting about getting hurt. this pawn doesn't know why, this pawn's just wired differently.
traits.name: masochist

traits.description:
Timmy likes to be up during the night, and sleep during the day.

this pawn gets a mood bonus if awake at night (23h-6h) and mood loss if awake during the day (11h-18h).

this pawn doesn't get a mood penalty for being in the dark.
traits.name: nightowl

traits.description: Timmy needs a really impressive bedroom. this pawn gets a mood loss if this pawn doesn't get what this pawn wants.
traits.name: greedy

traits.description: For Timmy, it's degrading to have a less impressive bedroom than someone else. this pawn gets a mood loss if any colonist has a more impressive bedroom.
traits.name: jealous

traits.description: Timmy has forsaken physical comforts and enjoyments in favor of a simple, pure lifestyle. this pawn will become unhappy if this pawn has a bedroom that's too impressive. this pawn also dislikes fancy food and prefers to eat raw. this pawn never judges others by their appearance.
traits.name: ascetic

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of their own gender.
traits.name: gay

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people regardless of gender.
traits.name: bisexual

traits.description: Timmy is uninterested in romantic entanglements.
traits.name: asexual

traits.description: Timmy's voice has a particularly grating, nasal quality to it, and this pawn tends to talk in barked, garbled phrases. This predisposes others to dislike them.
traits.name: annoyingvoice

traits.description: Timmy breathes heavily all the time, and sweats constantly. People find it creepy.
traits.name: creepybreathing

traits.description: Timmy loves fire. this pawn will never extinguish fires. To relieve stress, this pawn will occasionally go on random fire starting sprees. This happens more often if their mood is low.
traits.name: pyromaniac

traits.description: Timmy is weak and cowardly. Even a little pain will immobilize them.
traits.name: wimp

traits.description: Timmy has remarkable kinesthetic intelligence. this pawn seems to dance around danger with preternatural grace.
traits.name: nimble

traits.description: Timmy is slow on the uptake. this pawn learns much slower than others.
traits.name: slowlearner

traits.description: Timmy has no need to experience the outdoors or light. this pawn will never feel cooped up or get cabin fever, no matter how long this pawn stays inside, and is not bothered by darkness.
traits.name: undergrounder

traits.description: Timmy feels limited in their feeble human body. this pawn often dreams of being enhanced by artificial body parts.
traits.name: bodymodder

traits.description: Timmy believes the human body is limited for a reason. To them, artificial body parts are unethical and disgusting.
traits.name: bodypurist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts men.
traits.name: misandrist

traits.description: Timmy really dislikes and distrusts women.
traits.name: misogynist

traits.description: Timmy has a fantastic memory for detail. this pawn will lose unused skills at half the rate of other people.
traits.name: greatmemory

traits.description: Timmy has thick skin, dense flesh, and durable bones. this pawn takes much less damage than other people from the same blows. this pawn is extremely hard to kill.
traits.name: tough

traits.description: Timmy feels alienated and misunderstood by other human beings. this pawn will have a constant mood debuff, but gain a chance (50%) to get a creativity inspiration after a mental break.
traits.name: torturedartist

traits.description: Timmy's life revolves around food. this pawn gets hungry quickly, and will occasionally be overcome with the urge to eat ravenously, even when not hungry.
traits.name: gourmand

traits.description: Timmy doesn't need as much sleep as the average person. Whether this pawn's sleeping on a bed or on the ground, this pawn will be fully rested in about two thirds the usual time.
traits.name: quicksleeper

traits.description: Timmy is always falling behind the group whenever this pawn goes anywhere.
traits.name: slowpoke

traits.description: Timmy likes to be where this pawn's going. this pawn walks quicker than most people.
traits.name: fastwalker

traits.description: Timmy always moves with a sense of urgency - so much so that others often fail to keep up.
traits.name: jogger

traits.description: Timmy is utterly fascinated with chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possibly drug binges. this pawn will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalfascination

traits.description: Timmy has an unusual interest in chemical sources of enjoyment. Consuming recreational drugs will create a good mood, while abstaining will lead to increasing frustration over time and possible drug binges. this pawn will ignore directives to not use recreational drugs, and will consume more than a normal person.
traits.name: chemicalinterest

traits.description: Timmy abhors the idea of gaining pleasure from chemicals. this pawn strictly avoids alcohol and recreational drugs.
stats: Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.
Binging on drug mental state disabled.

traits.name: teetotaler

traits.description: Timmy is just naturally upbeat about their situation, pretty much all the time, no matter what it is.
traits.name: sanguine

traits.description: Timmy is naturally optimistic about life. It's hard to get them down.
traits.name: optimist

traits.description: Timmy tends to look on the bad side of life.
traits.name: pessimist

traits.description: Timmy is perenially unhappy. this pawn has trouble sustaining a good mood even when everything is fine.
traits.name: depressive

traits.description: Timmy's will is an iron shield. this pawn keeps going through thick and thin, when others broke down long before.
traits.name: iron-willed

traits.description: Timmy is mentally tough and won't break down under stresses that would crack most people.
traits.name: steadfast

traits.description: Timmy tends to crack under pressure.
traits.name: nervous

traits.description: Timmy is on a hair-trigger all the time. this pawn is the first to break in any tough situation.
traits.name: volatile

traits.description: Timmy likes to have things squared away. this pawn will work harder than most to attain this state of affairs, but their nerves can get the better of them.
traits.name: neurotic

traits.description: Timmy feels constantly nervous about everything that has to get done. this pawn will work extremely hard to attain this state of affairs, but their nerves can easily get the better of them.
traits.name: veryneurotic

traits.description: Timmy has an easy time staying on-task and focused, and gets things done much faster than the average person.
traits.name: industrious

traits.description: Timmy is a natural hard worker and will finish tasks faster than most.
traits.name: hardworker

traits.description: Timmy is a little bit lazy.
traits.name: lazy

traits.description: Timmy loves idleness and hates anything productive. this pawn moves slowly and rarely stays focused on a task.
traits.name: slothful

traits.description: Timmy's mind is like a psychic tuning fork. this pawn is extremely sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallyhypersensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is unusually sensitive to psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallysensitive

traits.description: Timmy's mind is psychically out of tune with others. this pawn isn't as affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydull

traits.description: Timmy's mind works on a psychic frequency different from everyone else. this pawn just isn't affected by psychic phenomena.
traits.name: psychicallydeaf

traits.description: Timmy takes more time to aim when shooting. this pawn shoots less often than others, but with more accuracy.
traits.name: carefulshooter

traits.description: Pew! Pew! Pew! Timmy just likes pulling the trigger. this pawn shoots faster than others, but less accurately.
traits.name: trigger-happy

traits.description: Timmy is exceptionally beautiful, with an exotic-yet-familiar facial structure and an arresting gaze. People are attracted to them before this pawn even opens their mouth.
traits.name: beautiful

traits.description: Timmy has a pretty face, which predisposes people to like them.
traits.name: pretty

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat ugly. This subtly repels others during social interactions.
traits.name: ugly

traits.description: Timmy is staggeringly ugly. their face looks like a cross between a drawing by an untalented child, a malformed fetus in a jar of formaldehyde, and a piece of modern art. Others must exert conscious effort to look at them while conversing.
traits.name: staggeringlyugly

traits.description: Timmy has a naturally powerful immune system. this pawn will gain immunity much faster than a normal person would, and can survive illnesses that would kill others.
traits.name: super-immune

traits.description: Timmy has an awful immune system. this pawn gets sick more often than usual, frequently with illnesses that nobody in the colony has been afflicted by.
traits.name: sickly

traits.description: Timmy hates and distrusts xenos. They see them as little more than animals.
traits.name: xenophobe

traits.description: Timmy thinks aliens are exotic and interesting. They would love to get to know them more and wouldn't mind forming relationships with them.
traits.name: xenophile

traits.description: Either the body or mind of Timmy is one of insight and experience. While some find them old fashioned, others will respect their guidance.

data.mod: Vanilla Ideology Expanded - Memes and Structures

traits.name: elder

traits.description: A strict principle of nonviolence which applies to all living things.
traits.name: vowofnonviolence

traits.description: Timmy is always ready to learn new things.
traits.name: fastlearner

traits.description: Timmy is averse to change or innovation, preferring to hold traditional values.
traits.name: conservative

traits.description: Timmy is an expert when it comes to economics. They prefer to spend more time trading and less time working though.
traits.name: mercantile

traits.description: Timmy is very fit and can easily move at fast speeds.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Some people see great value and potential in Timmy.
traits.name: valuable

traits.description: Some people see little value and potential in Timmy.
traits.name: worthless

traits.description: Timmy has lots of past combat experience, though this means that they are a bit on edge.
traits.name: experiencedcombatant

traits.description: Timmy isn't exactly an accurate shooter and tends to miss the shot.
traits.name: badshot

traits.description: Timmy is a natural when it comes to shooting.
traits.name: sniper

traits.description: Timmy is a pure, rare genius.
traits.name: genius

traits.description: Timmy is smarter than the average Joe.
traits.name: intelligent

traits.description: Timmy is not the brightest in the bunch and has less brain power.
traits.name: unintelligent

traits.description: Timmy lacks when it comes to brain power but is oblivious to psycic disruption.
traits.name: brainless

traits.description: Timmy has inferior strengh compared to others.
traits.name: weak

traits.description: Timmy is a living tank and can take on most opponents with ease.
traits.name: indestructable

traits.description: Timmy just can't get enough from hurting people, this pawn is six times more likely to get into a social fight than others .
traits.name: violent

traits.description: Timmy has unbelievable kinesthetic intelligence. this pawn seems to dance elegantly around danger with not a single worry.
traits.name: verynimble

traits.description: Timmy doesn't like to eat a lot of food. However, they are not themselves when they are hungry.
traits.name: pickyeater

traits.description: Timmy doesn't get as much sleep as others and needs to rest much longer.
traits.name: insomnia

traits.description: Timmy is forgetful and will lose unused skills much faster than others.
traits.name: forgetful

traits.description: Timmy has been selected by nature to be more durable.Timmy's genes have evolved above everyone elses.
traits.name: naturallyselected

traits.description: Timmy has been selected by a higher being to become more powerful.
traits.name: chosen

traits.description: Timmy is truly God-Like, and extremely valuable. If you have one of these colonists, look after them well, I mean it. If you don't bad luck. This trait has a 1.5% chance.
traits.name: god-like

traits.description: Timmy has a healthy immune system. This means that they have a better chance at surviving diseases.
traits.name: healthy

traits.description: Timmy has an unhealthy immune system. This means they are more likely to suffer from diseases.
traits.name: unhealthy

traits.description: Timmy is very good at communicating with other people.
traits.name: socialite

traits.description: Timmy has a strong back which allows them to carry more than most people.
traits.name: strongback

traits.description: Timmy has a very strong back, this pawn must be part mule or something because this pawn can carry a lot more than most people.
traits.name: verystrongback

traits.description: Timmy has a charismatic personality. this pawn is good at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: charismatic

traits.description: Timmy has a very charismatic personality. this pawn is great at social interactions and trading.
traits.name: verycharismatic

traits.description: Timmy has an intimidating personality, this gives them an advantage in social interactions.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: intimidating

traits.description: Timmy has a very intimidating personality, this gives them a large advantage in social interactions.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryintimidating

traits.description: Timmy has poor hand-eye coordination and will miss their target more often in combat.
traits.name: pooraim

traits.description: Timmy has good hand-eye coordination and will miss their target less often in combat.
traits.name: steadyaim

traits.description: Timmy has great hand-eye coordination and will miss their target less often in combat.
traits.name: greataim

traits.description: Timmy is a skilled crafter with artistic finesse, this pawn enjoys putting things together and this pawn's pretty good at it.
traits.name: artisan

traits.description: Timmy has an iron stomach. this pawn can go without eating longer and it takes more to upset their stomach.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: ironstomach

traits.description: Timmy packs lightly. this pawn will carry less but will move more swiftly.
traits.name: packin'light

traits.description: Timmy is a pack rat, this pawn will keep just about anything that might be useful later.
traits.name: packrat

traits.description: Timmy has good reflexes and moves with finesse. this pawn will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: agile

traits.description: Timmy has great reflexes and moves like a ninja. this pawn will land and dodge more attacks in melee combat.
traits.name: ninja

traits.description: Timmy is more intelligent than average. this pawn learns faster and has a good understanding of the world around them.
traits.name: intelligent

traits.description: Timmy is very intelligent. this pawn learns faster and has a great understanding of the world around them.
traits.name: veryintelligent

traits.description: Timmy is aware of their surroundings and has a good understanding of how their actions affects others.
traits.name: perceptive

traits.description: Timmy is very aware of their surroundings and has a great understanding of how their actions affects others.
traits.name: veryperceptive

traits.description: Timmy is good at doging things. this pawn is good at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: dodgy

traits.description: Timmy is great at evading things. this pawn is great at avoiding springing traps and dodging melee attacks.
traits.name: evasive

traits.description: Timmy is great at traveling. this pawn moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: traveler

traits.description: Timmy is great at exploration. this pawn moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: explorer

traits.description: Timmy is great at adventuring. this pawn moves quickly while carrying more and will forage extra nutrition while traveling in caravans.
traits.name: adventurer

traits.description: Timmy is a bandolier. this pawn likes to keep extra ammo handy for reloading ranged weapons.
traits.name: bandolier

traits.description: Timmy has a scientific mind. this pawn is a good researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: scientific

traits.description: Timmy has a very scientific mind. this pawn is a great researcher and a fast learner.
traits.name: veryscientific

traits.description: Timmy has good health and an enduring personality. this pawn is better at handling stressful situations than others.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: enduring

traits.description: Timmy has exceptional health and a very enduring personality. this pawn is capable of handling high stress situations that others cannot.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryenduring

traits.description: Timmy is great at bargaining. this pawn is great at social interactions and can find great deals while trading.
traits.name: bargainer

traits.description: Timmy is a hard bargainer. this pawn is adept at social interactions and can find the best deals while trading.
traits.name: hardbargainer

traits.description: Timmy has an uninspiring personality. this pawn has less motivation to learn and puts less effort into social interactions.
stats: -10% per day slave suppression fall rate
-10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: uninspiring

traits.description: Timmy has an inspirational personality. this pawn is good at social interactions and is a motivated learner .
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: inspirational

traits.description: Timmy has a very inspirational personality. this pawn is great at social interactions and is a very motivated learner.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: veryinspirational

traits.description: Timmy is a generous person, sometimes to a fault. this pawn is a good negotiator but often does so by offering more than this pawn should.
traits.name: generous

traits.description: Timmy is an overly generous person to a fault. this pawn is a great negotiator but often does so by offering more than this pawn should
traits.name: overlygenerous

traits.description: Timmy is good at working with scrap metal. this pawn is great with a smelter and is efficient when using building materials.
traits.name: scrapper

traits.description: Timmy is a natural leader, this pawn is good at social interactions and can handle stressful situations that others might not.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: naturalleader

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a resistance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radresistant

traits.description: Timmy's body has built up a tolerance to the negative effects of toxic fallout.
traits.name: radtolerant

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actionboy

traits.description: There's no time to waste! Timmy has increased movement and work speed.
traits.name: actiongirl

traits.description: Timmy has quick hands. When it comes to their hands, Timmy never hesitates.
traits.name: quickhands

traits.description: Timmy is a gun nut, this pawn loves guns so much that this pawn gets a mood boost while holding a ranged weapon.
traits.name: gunnut

traits.description: Timmy knows how to scavenge and gather for resources quickly, but if you think that's fast wait until you see this pawn eat!
traits.name: scrounger

traits.description: Timmy has a sturdy frame. this pawn can carry more and it takes more to bring them down.
traits.name: sturdyframe

traits.description: Timmy is survialist. this pawn has a natural ability to survive some situations that others might not.
traits.name: survivalist

traits.description: Timmy finds the gap to make the tackle! this pawn moves quickly and gets the jobs done before anyone can react.
traits.name: blitz

traits.description: Timmy is a philanthropist. this pawn is generally good natured and cares for the welfare of others.
traits.name: philanthropist

traits.description: Timmy has healing hands. Whether it's for patching up or food the colony knows they can count on their healing touch.
traits.name: healinghands

traits.description: Timmy is part tree! It takes more to bring Timmy down but also more to get them moving.
stats: +20% per day slave suppression fall rate
+20% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: rooted

traits.description: Timmy has a lead belly. their belly can go much longer without food and this pawn is more resistant to toxic radiation.
traits.name: leadbelly

traits.description: Timmy has bear arms. this pawn can carry more and their arms pack more of a punch!
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: beararms

traits.description: Timmy is serendipitous, this pawn seems to be a pretty lucky individual and this pawn's pretty happy about it too.
stats: +10% per day slave suppression fall rate
+10% per day slave suppression fall rate

traits.name: serendipitous

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for gardening. this pawn is quick when working with plants and recieves more bountiful yields when harvesting them.
traits.name: greenthumb

traits.description: Timmy is a tenderizer! this pawn has a passion for beating meat into submission.
traits.name: tenderizer

traits.description: Timmy seems to discover hidden wealth where ever this pawn goes.
traits.name: fortunefinder

traits.description: Timmy is a bountiful butcher! this pawn isn't afraid to dig a little deeper to get what this pawn wants.
traits.name: bountifulbutcher

traits.description: Timmy has a passion for animals. this pawn is adept at animal interactions and will bond with them more often. Timmy refuses to hunt animals.
traits.name: animalfriend

traits.description: Timmy has a magnetic body, literally! Somehow this pawn able to use their attractiveness on not just colonists, but metals too!.
traits.name: magnetic

traits.description: Timmy embodies wellness! Colonist who need treatment can rest easily knowing they have their's expertise keeping them alive.
traits.name: lifegiver

traits.description: Timmy is a spiritual healer, this pawn is a great doctor with good social skills. Timmy loves to grow and make their own medicine.
traits.name: spiritualhealer

traits.description: Timmy has a frail back and won't be able to carry as much as the average person.
traits.name: frailback

traits.description: Timmy is still human, mostly. this pawn is immune to the effects of toxic fallout and much harder to kill but their ghoulish appearance makes interacting with others difficult.
traits.name: ghoulish

traits.description: Timmy isn't stupid! this pawn is just... different. this pawn works through tasks slowly but learns extremely quickly. this pawn is incapable performing intellectual, social or caring tasks.
traits.name: idiotsavant

traits.description: Timmy isn't very smart. this pawn can mess up doing just about anything.
traits.name: stupid

traits.description: Timmy isn't very aware of their surroundings, or anything at all really. this pawn
traits.name: oblivious

traits.description: Timmy is part woodchuck! this pawn wants everyone to think their great woodworking skills are because of talent but everybody knows it's really because of those dang teeth.
traits.name: woodchucker

traits.description: Timmy is a wrecking ball! this pawn can push through building material like it's not even there. this pawn really doesn't know their own strength, often breaking things during construction.
traits.name: wreckingball

traits.description: Timmy is a perfectionist with a passion for art. this pawn is great at construction but takes longer to complete tasks because this pawn puts too much effort into making everything perfect.
traits.name: perfectionist

traits.description: Timmy has an iron fist! this pawn can punch through foes like they are not even there. Timmy has a passion for melee combat and dislikes ranged weapons.
traits.name: ironfist

traits.description: Timmy hates everyone equally.
traits.name: misanthrope

traits.description: Timmy was born without a sense of taste and cannot enjoy food.
traits.name: dysgeuisia

traits.description: Timmy loves to eat food with a variety of ingredients but will be upset over bland food.
traits.name: eclecticpalate

traits.description: Timmy hates violence and wouldn't hurt a fly. They'll get upset if forced to do so.
traits.name: pacifist

traits.description: Timmy suffers from a neurological disorder that makes PAWN_object prone to randomly fall alseep anywhere.
traits.name: narcoleptic

traits.description: Timmy is irrationally afraid of fire and will flee the scene if not drafted. this pawn hates getting burns.
traits.name: pyrophobia

traits.description: Timmy is afraid of the dark. They'll will be extra unhappy when in darkness and has trouble sleeping without light.
traits.name: nyctophobia

traits.description: Timmy loves to sleep in and will gladly ignore their schedule if it means they can lie in bed and sleep some more.
traits.name: sleepyhead

traits.description: Timmy always feels good after a good night's sleep.
traits.name: lovessleeping

traits.description: Timmy was born with a strong, healthy body. They can carry more, mine faster, deal more damage in melee combat and take reduced damage from attacks.
traits.name: strongbody

traits.description: Timmy was unfortunately born with a weak, feeble body. They cannot carry as much as everyone else, mine slower, deal less damage in melee and take increased damage from attacks.
traits.name: weakbody

traits.description: Timmy has no goals in life. No dreams, motivation or passions. It's going to take a lot to break what is left of them.
traits.name: apathetic

traits.description: Timmy has an intense fear of insects and will not hesitate to run away upon spotting one.
traits.name: entomophobia

traits.description: Having had easy access to insect meat during most of their life Timmy became accustomed to eating it to the point that this pawn preferred it over normal meat.
traits.name: entomophagous

traits.description: Timmy loves the company of others. The more, the merrier.
traits.name: gregarious

traits.description: Timmy loves the rain. this pawn doesn't mind being wet and gets happy during rainy weather.
traits.name: pluviophile

traits.description: There's nothing Timmy loves more than snow! No amount of snow is going to slow them down.
traits.name: chionophile

traits.description: It doesn't take much to make Timmy either really excited or to bring their mood completely down.
traits.name: moody

traits.description:
Timmy prefers to wake up early in the day to get as much work done as possible during the day.

this pawn gets a mood boost if awake during the early hours of a day (5h-12h) and mood loss if awake during the evening (17h-0h).
traits.name: earlybird

traits.description: Timmy has grown accustomed to a tightly nit colony and loves sleeping in barracks. Preferably with many other pawns.
traits.name: communal

traits.description: Timmy likes seeing other pawns suffer and gets excited from causing damage.
traits.name: sadist

traits.description: For whatever purpose, Timmy has taught themself every swear word in the dictionary and uses this profane knowledge unconsciously in their day-to-day life.
traits.name: vulgar

traits.description: Timmy always tries to raise their fellow pawns' mood by telling jokes. Or try to, at least.
traits.name: comedian

traits.description: Timmy hates being in confined spaces.
traits.name: claustrophobic

traits.description: Timmy was born without the ability to feel pain. this pawn is unable to experience psychic phenomena as a side effect.
traits.name: congenitalanalgesia

traits.description: Timmy loves guns! Especially shooting them. If this pawn hits or not isn't important.
traits.name: guncrazy

traits.description: Timmy's body works at a faster rate than a normal person, letting them heal faster at the cost of getting hungry quicker.
traits.name: fastmetabolism

traits.description: Timmy's body works at a slower rate than a normal person, healing much slower as a result. At least they don't eat as much.
traits.name: slowmetabolism

traits.description: Timmy just loves the heat and won't suffer any negative thoughts related to being warm. this pawn despises being cold, though.
traits.name: thermophile

traits.description: Timmy just loves the cold and won't suffer any negative thoughts related to being cold. this pawn despises being warm, though.
traits.name: cryophile

traits.description:
Timmy's heart has innocence. Maybe it's because you've never experienced a tough world before.
this pawn will be more traumatized by violent acts such as cannibalism, organ harvesting and sight of dead bodies.
traits.name: innocence

traits.description: Timmy awakened with a new type. this pawn is amazing at dodging, and get +5 points for melee and shooting.
traits.name: newtype

traits.description: Timmy finds it difficult to focus on distant targets, and prefer to get up close and personal.
traits.name: nearsighted

traits.description: Timmy could spot a target from nearly a hundred meters, yet still somehow walk into walls.
traits.name: farsighted

traits.description: Timmy's movements are smooth and graceful.
traits.name: athletic

traits.description: Timmy is so rigid, it's almost like this pawn is souless.
traits.name: stiff

traits.description: Timmy takes care of their personal hygiene.
traits.name: goodhygiene

traits.description: Timmy doesn't care about their hygiene, and sometimes get sick from bad food.
traits.name: poorhygiene

traits.description: Timmy often gets their way with things.
traits.name: persuasive

traits.description: Timmy has never won a debate in their life.
traits.name: unconvincing

traits.description: Timmy has been in plenty of fights since this pawn was a kid, and had built up a tolerance to injury and pain as a result.
traits.name: resilient

traits.description: Timmy lived a pampered life until now, and is unused to the brutal challenges present out in the Rim.
traits.name: fragile

traits.description: Timmy always tackle his tasks with great enthusism.
traits.name: energetic

traits.description: Timmy is slow. Sooo... slooow...
traits.name: sluggish

traits.description: Timmy always sleep like a baby.
traits.name: restful

traits.description: Timmy often has a difficult time falling asleep.
traits.name: restless

traits.description: Timmy is quite productive when it comes to work.
traits.name: efficient

traits.description: Timmy is somewhat of a bottleneck in the colony.
traits.name: inefficient

traits.description: Timmy is brave, this pawn would stand their where others would scramble and run.
traits.name: valiant

traits.description: When there's a fight, Timmy is the first to run.
traits.name: craven

traits.description: Timmy likes a good fight, this pawn will sometimes start a fight just because this pawn can.
traits.name: rowdy

traits.description: Timmy is usually calm and collected.
traits.name: composed

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in hot environment than his peers.
traits.name: heattolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the heat.
traits.name: heatintolerant

traits.description: Timmy is more comfortable being in cold environment than his peers.
traits.name: coldtolerant

traits.description: Timmy does not like being in the cold.
traits.name: coldintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has a well built body, people around this pawn find that rather attractive.
traits.name: muscular

traits.description: Timmy looks a bit fragile, but not in a lovable way.
traits.name: frail

traits.description: Timmy doesn't eat or drink much.
traits.name: abstinent

traits.description: Timmy has a bottomless pit for a stomach.
traits.name: ravenous

traits.description: This is what a common trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:common

traits.description: This is what an uncommon trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:uncommon

traits.description: This is what a rare trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:rare

traits.description: This is what an epic trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:epic

traits.description: This is what a legendary trait would look like when paired with RimTraits: Vanilla Trait Colours.
traits.name: traitdemo:legendary

traits.description: Timmy is naturally talented, this pawn gets a headstart before everyone else.
traits.name: gifted

traits.description: Timmy is someone everyone loves to hate.
traits.name: incompetent

traits.description: Timmy takes great care in the preparation of food, this pawn never skip a step just to have an early meal.
traits.name: patientcook

traits.description: Timmy couldn't care less about following the recipes as long as this pawn can get food into their mouth in record time.
traits.name: impatientcook

traits.description: Timmy lives a healthy lifestyle, and wakes up feeling energetic and cheerful.
traits.name: healthy

traits.description: Timmy gets ill quite often, and seem to require more effort to get out of bed than the average person.
traits.name: chronicallyill

traits.description: Timmy is comfortable in all seasons.
traits.name: temperaturetolerant

traits.description: Timmy thinks that summer is way too hot, and winter is way too cold.
traits.name: temperatureintolerant

traits.description: Timmy has good reaction time and finds physical activities less stressful than their peers.
traits.name: coordinated

traits.description: Timmy is easily distracted and often mess up when it comes to physical activities.
traits.name: clumsy

traits.description: Timmy is what people refer to as a 'stronk boi'.
traits.name: hardy

traits.description: Timmy is so fragile, it doesn't take much to take them out of action.
traits.name: feeble

traits.description: Whether by sheer optimism or a force of personality, Timmy always manages to see the bright side of life.
traits.name: easilyamused

traits.description: Life to Timmy is an endless, boring joke that this pawn just can't get away from.
traits.name: constantlybemused

traits.description: Timmy has an interest in understanding the workings of the world, and is able to apply their knowledge in daily life.
traits.name: inquisitive

traits.description: Gaps in Timmy's education and general lack of curiosity makes life often stressful for them.
traits.name: ignorant

traits.description: Timmy is an aberration, being changed by supernatural forces while still being created to create an advanced being.

data.mod: Beyond the End of the World

traits.name: quantumaberration

traits.description: Timmy is an aberration, being changed by supernatural forces while still being created. Unfortunately, Timmy got the short end of the deal.

data.mod: Beyond the End of the World

traits.name: quantumaberration

traits.description: Timmy is a Cheetah. Timmy is a great runner with a sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, this pawn is not a very Social being.
traits.name: cheetah

traits.description: Timmy is a Leo. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight and is rather Social, compared to other Feline species.
traits.name: leo

traits.description: Timmy is a Jaguar. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, this pawn is not a very Social being.
traits.name: jaguar

traits.description: Timmy is a Panther. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, this pawn is not a very Social being.
traits.name: panther

traits.description: Timmy is a Tigris. Timmy is a great natural predator with sharp sight. However, just like most Feline species, this pawn is not a very Social being.
traits.name: tigris

traits.description: Timmy enjoys the solitude and tranquility inherent to long fishing sessions. this pawn will prefer fishing above other activities.
traits.name: fisherman

traits.description: Timmy identifies strongly as a male. Physical traits related to the Male gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.
traits.name: transmale

traits.description: Timmy identifies strongly as a female. Physical traits related to the Female gender give mood boosts, while traits conflicting with it will give negative mood.
traits.name: transfemale

traits.description: Timmy does not want to be identified as any gender. The closer to truly androgynous they are, the happier they are.
traits.name: trans:androgyne

traits.description: Timmy is content with their body, regardless of their identified gender. They will experience no form of dysphoria.
traits.name: body-content

traits.description: Timmy is much more affected by dysphoria than normal.
traits.name: body-sensitive

traits.description: Timmy dislikes children.
traits.name: dislikeschildren

traits.description: Timmy is the child of a werewolf and will first transfrom when coming of age.
traits.name: werewolf-child

traits.description: Timmy has been born in the colony.
traits.name: naturalborncolony-child

traits.description: Timmy is too young to work.
traits.name: tooyoungtowork

traits.description: Timmy is the Maru. They feel the warmth, remind themselves that they are alive, and clear their minds.
traits.name: flameworship

traits.description:
Any object, event, or technology has cause and effect.
Timmy is very skilled at identifying and learning such causal relationships.
traits.name: sharpeye

traits.description:
Timmy's body is naturally flexible.
Stronger and more flexible than others, it has a significant advantage in hunting.
traits.name: flexible

traits.description:
Timmy believes that he is right.
The firm belief has a positive effect on their will, just like their piety, but he also tends to ignore the opinions of others.
traits.name: self-righteousness

traits.description:
A person with strong leadership always influences those around them, either positively or negatively.
No one knows what path such a person will choose or what kind of life he will lead. But one thing is certain, this pawn won't be an ordinary person who comes and goes into the world without anyone knowing. /n/nTimmy was born with that gift.
traits.name: leadership

traits.description:
Timmy has ears that are sensitive to even small sounds.
 Being sensitive to sounds is always an advantage in life outside of its nest, but it also has the disadvantage of not being able to fall asleep deeply.
traits.name: sensitiveears

traits.description:
Timmy is an experimentally cultivated Maru.
It has significantly superior physical abilities than other floors, but its autoimmunity is very low due to its imperfect design.
traits.name: prototype

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: inquisitivemind

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: senseofduty

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: philosophy

traits.description: A fragment of a talent to accomplish a feat.
traits.name: warp

traits.description: In a dream Timmy was greeted by the god of the Sixth House. Ever since then the bells of the Sixth House quitely ring in their ears.
traits.name: touchedbydagothur

traits.description: Timmy is romantically attracted to people of the opposite gender.
traits.name: straight

traits.description: Timmy will never cheat on a partner, no matter how bad the relationship gets.
traits.name: faithful

traits.description: Timmy just cannot be trusted to stay faithful to a partner.
traits.name: philanderer

traits.description: Timmy prefers romantic relationships involving multiple partners to monogamous relationships. this pawn doesn't mind if their partners romance other people, but will be less happy in a restraining, monogamous relationship.
traits.name: polyamorous

traits.description: Timmy's reflexes are truly out of this world. They can parry melee attacks without any training and with luck even bullets.
traits.name: quickreflexes

traits.description: Timmy's reflexes transcend common sense. They can easily parry melee attacks without any training and with a bit of luck even bullets.
traits.name: transcendentreflexes

traits.description: Timmy is able to tear apart the fabrics of reality, moving living beings through space at the speed of light.
traits.name: teleporter

traits.description: Timmy is able to hide himself from prying eyes, literally leaving under the noses of enemies.
traits.name: inquisitor

traits.description: Timmy has an explosive character and is great at concentrating this power.
traits.name: phoenix

traits.description: Timmy has the ability to manipulate water and its forms.
traits.name: aquarior

traits.description: Timmy can manipulate the ground under his feet, making it serve.
traits.name: terrarior

traits.description: Timmy subdues the air around him, setting it in motion.
traits.name: aeron

traits.description: Timmy able to control electromagnetic waves.
traits.name: magnetic

traits.description: Timmy is able to manipulate people and absorb their emotions.
traits.name: mentalist

traits.description: Timmy has the ability to help peoples.
traits.name: paladin

traits.description: Timmy has always loved ash storms. The feeling of ash slowly wearing down skin, burning the sinuses and filling unexpected holes. this pawn gets unreasonably happy whenever this pawn is outside in one.
traits.name: ashlover

traits.description: Timmy has mastered the art of breathing during an ash storm, and no longer suffers buildup during one. Though this doesn't meant this pawn enjoys being outside in them.
traits.name: ashbreather

traits.description: Timmy has plenty of experience dealing with slaves, and knows well what makes them tick. Timmy also doesn't really care if something... unfortunate happens to one.
traits.name: slaver

traits.description: Timmy has the potential to use magicka on a grander scale than others.
traits.name: mageacolyte

traits.description: Timmy has been trained in the art of magic and uses it well.
traits.name: magejourneyman

traits.description: Timmy is a full mage and has been professionally trained in the arcane arts.
traits.name: mage

traits.description: Timmy is a formidable fighter. this pawn knows how to effectively handle a weapon and take blows.
traits.name: fighter

traits.description: Timmy is a veteran. this pawn has experienced countless of horrifying battles enough to break a common man.
traits.name: veteran

traits.description: Timmy is entombed in a warcasket. No amount of pain will have an effect on them, and they can never go into a pain shock or drop unconscious due to pain. Because of how bulky the armor is and how much energy it takes to use it, Timmy is not capable of doing any work.
traits.name: warcasket

traits.description: Timmy was entombed in a warcasket, and then brutally pulled out of one. The neural and nerve damage from being unplugged is so severe that Timmy is in constant, agonizing pain and can barely assemble his thoughts. Only installing Timmy back in a warcasket can cure the symptoms.
traits.name: shellcasket

traits.description: Due to the limitations of this androids mind: they are only barely able to understand and feel emotion. This makes them less than desired in social situations.
traits.name: simpleminded

traits.description: A mechanized infantry unit, they do not think or feel.
traits.name: mech

traits.description: Timmy is intolerant of all lifeforms, whether they be mechanical or biological. There is always a chance they will randomly cause fights, especially when their mood is low.
traits.name: intolerance

traits.description: Timmy has a deep fondness toward all humans, seeing them as not only their own creators but as parental figures.
traits.name: loveshumanity

traits.description: Timmy has a deep hatred toward all of humanity, seeing them as nothing more than egotistical meatbags.
traits.name: hateshumanity

traits.description: text.todo
traits.name: thrall

races.description: A baseline human, mostly unmodified by gene engineering and mostly unchanged by evolutionary pressures on non-Earth planets.
races.name: human

races.description: An anthropomorphic feline that likes to live in hot climates. They are known for having abnormal regenerative properties.
races.name: lemolim

races.description: The creation of a twisted bioengineer. A race of skinny humanoids with large heads, violent behavior and an impressive resistence to damage.
races.name: stickman

races.description: When the impostor is sus
races.name: amogus

races.description: Beanos
races.name: Beanos

races.description: Most believe that this is a new stage of human evolution.
races.name: Demonoid

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Cheetah are perhaps one of the fastest Felines with an instant reaction. They literally dance around an opponent in melee fight and even dodge bullets if lucky enough. Cheetah are one of the most intelligent felines and are more social, compared to most felines.
races.name: Cheetah

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Jaguars are perhaps one of the strongest and toughest Felines. You shouldn't understimate them despite their size. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone.
races.name: Jaguar

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Leo, unlike other Felines, are very social beings and feel themselves confident in all kinds of discussions.
races.name: Leo

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Panthers do not have any special features compared to other felines, expect their dark black fur. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone.
races.name: Panther

races.description: Feles is a group of genetically-engineered species representing some of the most popular feline species from planet Earth. Tigris are perhaps one of the strongest and toughest Felines. You shouldn't understimate them despite their size. They are not a very social beings and tend to spend their free time alone.
races.name: Tigris

races.description: A race that lives on the ruins of an unknown civilization. Also called Far North or Yeti, they live in a small society over a wide radius.
races.name: Maru

races.description: A bloodthirsty vulpine near-human.
races.name: Revia

races.description: A weird being.
races.name: Anthro

races.description:
A humanoid race living in cities under the sea. Having traits similar to sea creatures, their blood contains substances that can be used for various medical uses.

Descendants of glitterworld explorers who settled in the deep sea, generations of body modifications has led to their current form. Spreading far and wide into the rim, they built many cities and prospered. Until now.
races.name: Moyo

races.description: A subspecies of the Moyo race, usually babies born after a Moyo is fertilized by a creature infected with the deep-sea virus. And because the symbiotic virus affects, most of them have strange personalities, but not intrinsically bad.
races.name: Red Moyo

races.description:
Its an Umbreon! it is recognisable by its black fur and yellow rings. its red eyes remind some people of evil while its glowing rings is a sign of hope to others.
	
+ Due to moonlight, umbreons have the insight for researching.
+ Slightly faster than humans.
+ Their fur insulates them a bit.
+ 20% more HP than humans.
+ Not bothered by darkness.
~ Low sensitivity for psychic effects.
~ higher chance for nightowl trait.
~ Uses their claws!
~ Slightly smaller than humans.
- Needs a little more food.
races.name: umbreon

races.description:
A basic mechanent, or a "human-class mechanoid". Often used by glitterworld societies or advanced urbworlds as a menial labor force - they are capable of sub-sentience and certain emotions. Their creation is illegal on some core-worlds.

Being mechanical in nature - mechanents do not need to rest, and just like mechanoids, they can be susceptible to psychic tampering.
races.name: mechanent

races.description:
The vessel of an AI persona. A relatively new creation originating from advanced glitterworld laboratories - they have all the capabilities of a baseline human. They are illegal on most planets, due to fearing the potential of such advanced AI - because of this most try to hide from society and pass as normal humans.

Despite being synthetic in nature - personae still need to rest, but they don't need fuel - being able to last for years on their internal reactor without refueling, and they can heal internal damage due to lattice dust distribution systems. They can experience everything from psychic tampering, to complex emotions.
races.name: persona

races.description: A form of mechanized infantry, produced during an ancient time on this rimworld. These units are very strong, powerful war machines but are subsequently slow and have limited battery to them.
races.name: M7 Mechanised infantry

races.description: A prototype M7 mechanized infantry, equipped with a limited SkyCore unit and SkyMind radio. These units are very strong, powerful war machines and allow digital consciousness to move on battlefields but are subsequently slow and have limited internal storage capacity to them.
races.name: M8 Mechanised infantry

races.description: A lost android, shunned from their transcendant community. The tech used to make them is beyond human comprehension, boasting near unlimited power and requiring little sustinence to operate. They deem all races other than themselves to be somewhat below them and believe that living on a rimworld is a fate worse than death.
races.name: T5 Android

races.description: The most advanced form of android conceivable; this tier is able to efficiently hold the consciousness of any AI uploaded onto it, with advanced locomotive abilities and manipulation; this android vastly suprasses most humans.
races.name: T4 Android

races.description: A Prototype android exclusive to this rimworld; developed by a secret R/D Laboratory, away from the eye of the rest of the planet and cosmos. This android features highly advanced locomotive and motor abilities, perfectly mimicing that of an average human. Although clunky and somewhat slow - this android features a modular component design, allowing for upgrades to be made to current parts at any point.
races.name: T3 Android

races.description: As simple as sentient robotics can get. This design is the bare skeletal amount of components needed to create full autonomous functionality. Obviously not the best but it works well when needed.
races.name: T1 Android

races.description: A somewhat advanced android, capable of almost perfectly storing an AI consciousness and with reasonable levels of motor skills. A good all round android that is uses extensively on glitterworlds for basic maintenance and cleaning.
races.name: T2 Android

races.description: A humanoid sentient species of insect, similar to moths.
races.name: Motz

races.description: A race of goblinoids capable of high speed movement, they have developed a hardened carapace on top of their heads similar to a natural helmet of sorts to protect them from any high speed impacts which are surprisingly common.
races.name: Varag

races.description: A small race of goblinoids, they are the most common of their kind.
races.name: Goblin

races.description: A race of goblinoids closely resembling humans with a few goblinoid features.
races.name: Hobgoblin

races.description: A near human race most often seen among goblinoids, the only differences from humans on the surface are the two small tusks protruding from their mouths and that they're usually of a similar green to the various goblinoids. They are relatively rare compared to other races in general.
races.name: Orc

races.description: A humanoid sentient species closely resembling a human with long pointy ears.
races.name: Elf
